org.xamjwg.platform
Interface ClientletSelector

public interface ClientletSelector

Interface implemented in order to handle web responses, typically new content types.

Field Summary
static Clientlet SKIP
          This should be returned by the select method if a ClientletSelector implementation does not know how to handle a request.
 
Method Summary
 Clientlet select(ClientletRequest request, ClientletResponse response)
          Gets a Clientlet instance that can handle the given request and response.
 

Field Detail

SKIP

static final Clientlet SKIP
This should be returned by the select method if a ClientletSelector implementation does not know how to handle a request.

See Also:
select(ClientletRequest, ClientletResponse)
Method Detail

select

Clientlet select(ClientletRequest request,
                 ClientletResponse response)
Gets a Clientlet instance that can handle the given request and response. It should return SKIP if it does not how to handle them. Generally a selector should only attempt to handle a specific content type.

See Also:
SKIP
